SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Broker
Broker class that handles the communication between publishers, subscribers, and other brokers.
ClientHandler
Handles communication with a connected client (publisher, subscriber, or broker).
DirectoryHandler
DirectoryHandler handles client connections to the directory service.
DirectoryService
Directory Service class that registers brokers and provides information about available brokers to publishers and subscribers.
Publisher
Represents a publisher that interacts with a broker in a publisher-subscriber system.
Subscriber
Represents a subscriber that interacts with a broker in a publisher-subscriber system.
